name: LambdaTest
description: LambdaTest is an AI-native cloud platform for automated and manual testing of web and mobile applications across diverse browsers and devices.
longDescription: LambdaTest is a cloud-based, AI-augmented test orchestration and execution platform designed to streamline software testing for developers and QA teams. Founded in 2017 and headquartered in San Francisco, it serves over 10,000 enterprises and 2 million users across 130 countries. The platform enables seamless testing across more than 3,000 browser, OS, and real-device combinations, ensuring compatibility and performance. Its mission is to accelerate digital transformation by reducing time-to-market through faster, scalable, and reliable testing solutions. LambdaTest integrates with CI/CD pipelines and offers tools like KaneAI for intelligent test automation, addressing modern testing challenges. It is trusted by leading companies for its robust infrastructure and comprehensive testing capabilities.
features: Cross-browser testing supports over 3,000 browser and OS combinations for comprehensive compatibility testing.
Real-time testing enables live interaction with web apps to identify issues instantly, speeding up market readiness.
Automated Selenium testing runs scripts across multiple browsers, enhancing testing efficiency and coverage.
KaneAI, a smart AI test agent, allows teams to create, debug, and evolve tests using natural language for faster automation.
Real Device Cloud supports manual and automated mobile app testing on a wide range of real mobile and OTT devices.
AI-powered visual regression testing ensures consistent visual appearance and functionality across platforms.
Test Analytics provides detailed, actionable insights on test execution, pass rates, and compatibility issues.
HyperExecute offers a reliable, high-speed test execution platform for parallel testing, reducing test cycles.
120+ integrations with CI/CD, project management, and automation tools streamline development workflows.
Responsive testing tools verify website functionality across various screen sizes, supporting mobile-first strategies.
Geolocation testing allows testing of website behavior across different geographic locations for global compatibility.
Single Sign-On (SSO) integration with tools like Okta and OneLogin simplifies team onboarding and access.
LT Browser enables responsive testing directly from local systems, enhancing developer productivity.
SmartUI facilitates automated screenshot testing for quick visual validation across multiple configurations.
Accessibility testing tools ensure web applications meet inclusivity standards for diverse user needs.

faqs.question: What is LambdaTest used for?
faqs.answer: LambdaTest is used for cross-browser and real-device testing of web and mobile applications to ensure compatibility and performance across diverse environments.

faqs.question: Does LambdaTest offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, LambdaTest provides a Freemium plan with 2 sessions of limited testing time for live testing, renewable monthly, with no trial time limit.

faqs.question: What browsers and devices does LambdaTest support?
faqs.answer: LambdaTest supports over 3,000 browser, OS, and real-device combinations, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and mobile platforms like iOS and Android.

faqs.question: Can LambdaTest integrate with CI/CD pipelines?
faqs.answer: Yes, LambdaTest offers 120+ integrations with CI/CD tools, bug tracking, and test management systems to streamline development workflows.

faqs.question: What is KaneAI, and how does it help with testing?
faqs.answer: KaneAI is LambdaTest’s AI-powered test agent that enables teams to create, debug, and evolve tests using natural language, simplifying automation.

faqs.question: Is LambdaTest suitable for mobile app testing?
faqs.answer: Yes, LambdaTest’s Real Device Cloud supports manual and automated testing on real mobile and OTT devices for accurate results.

faqs.question: How does LambdaTest ensure test reliability?
faqs.answer: LambdaTest uses single-use VMs for consistent testing conditions and offers stable, scalable cloud infrastructure with minimal downtime.

faqs.question: What is HyperExecute, and what are its benefits?
faqs.answer: HyperExecute is a high-speed test execution platform that supports parallel testing, significantly reducing test cycles and time-to-market.

faqs.question: Does LambdaTest provide customer support?
faqs.answer: LambdaTest offers 24/7 in-app customer chat support and email support at support@lambdatest.com, along with detailed documentation.

faqs.question: Can I test locally hosted websites with LambdaTest?
faqs.answer: Yes, LambdaTest’s UnderPass Tunnel and Snowden allows testing of locally hosted websites on the cloud platform.

faqs.question: What are the pricing options for LambdaTest?
faqs.answer: Pricing is based on parallel sessionsಸessions and plan levels, with a free plan available and paid upgrades for unlimited testing; visit lambdatest.com for details.
